unnormalised: Arre bhai, this new building is going to be huge! They say it'll be like, 200 ft tall. I just hope they used enough cement, you know? Last time, they saved a few kgs and the wall cracked like a joke. And 500 sq ft flats? Seriously? My chappal is bigger than that! Anyway, heard they're using 10 mm steel rods, so fingers crossed it doesn't become another leaning tower of Pisa. ðŸ˜œ
normalised: Arre bhai, this new building is going to be huge! They say it will be like, two hundred feet tall. I just hope they used enough cement, you know? Last time, they saved a few kilograms and the wall cracked like a joke. And five hundred square feet flats? Seriously? My chappal is bigger than that! Anyway, heard they are using ten millimeter steel rods, so fingers crossed it does not become another leaning tower of Pisa.
